message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start to the game!
You started high, I'll try to get a better deal now!
You're trying to take advantage of me, but I'm not going to let you!
You're being stubborn, let's meet in the middle!
You're getting desperate, I'm not budging!
You're being tough, I'll try to squeeze you out!
You're running out of time, Bob! Take it or leave it!
You're getting greedy, I'll take the last chance!
You're running out of time, Bob. This is my final offer!
You're trying to take everything, I'll not let that happen!
You've had your chance, Bob. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
I'll take what's left, you've had your chance!
